main event: A pilot observed a white light and two smaller white lights moving fast and silently at Turner AFB in Georgia in December 1957.
interesting points: The pilot reported the larger light moving at high altitude,The two smaller lights followed the same direction as the larger light,One of the lights flashed before all lights disappeared after approximately 8 minutes,The observation lasted a total of 8 minutes,The report concluded with insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a larger white light and two smaller white lights in the sky
